message.entry: Column {0,number,integer}
'SourceTable' must be a table, timetable, cell vector of tables, or cell vector of timetables.
To use 'DisplayVariables', plot input must be a table or timetable.
''{0}'' is not a variable of the input table or timetable.
'DisplayVariables', when specified as an array of numeric indices, must be positive integers less than or equal to {0,number,integer}.
'DisplayVariables' must not contain empty cells.
'DisplayVariables' must be a string array, numeric array, logical array, cell array of character vectors, cell array of numeric arrays, or cell array of text arrays.
'DisplayVariables' must specify variables that are numeric, logical, datetime, duration, or categorical arrays, or are themselves tables or timetables, with at least one column.
'DisplayLabels' value must either be a string array, or a cell array containing character vectors or numeric vectors.
When specifying {0} as a logical array, its length must be equal to {1,number,integer}
'XLimits' value must contain monotonically increasing values.
To use 'XVariable', plot input must be a table or multiple tables.
To use 'XVariable', specify a variable of the input table.
If the value of 'XVariable' is a logical array, then it must contain one true element.
'XVariable' value must be a character vector, a string scalar, a positive integer, or a logical array with one true element.
'XVariable' value must specify a table variable that is a numeric, logical, datetime, or duration column vector.
'LineProperties' value must have the same length as the number of axes.
'AxesProperties' value must have the same length as the number of axes.
'Color' value must either be a 1-by-3 row vector or a N-by-3 matrix where N is the number of plots in the axes.
'MarkerFaceColor' value must either be a 1-by-3 row vector or a N-by-3 matrix where N is the number of plots in the axes.
'MarkerEdgeColor' value must either be a 1-by-3 row vector or a N-by-3 matrix where N is the number of plots in the axes.
'LineStyle' value must be either a character vector or a cell array of character vectors with length equal to the number of plots in the axes.
'LineWidth' value must be either a scalar or a vector with length equal to the number of plots in the axes.
'Marker' value must be either a character vector or a cell array of character vectors with length equal to the number of plots in the axes.
'MarkerSize' value must be either a scalar or a vector with length equal to the number of plots in the axes.
'PlotType' value must be either a character vector or a cell array of character vectors with length equal to the number of plots in the axes.
Unable to specify 'SourceTable' value when the 'XData' and 'YData' values are nonempty.
Unable to specify 'XData' and 'YData' values when the 'SourceTable' value is nonempty.
Parent container must be a figure, uipanel, or uitab.
Parent container is a deleted graphics object.
'LegendLabels' value must be a string array or cell array of character vectors.
'LegendLabels' value must be a vector with length equal to the number of plots in the axes.
'LegendLabels' value must be a vector with length less than or equal to the number of source tables.
Unable to plot variables that are nested tables or timetables using the same axes as the other variables.
Table variables ''{0}'' and ''{1}'' cannot be plotted in the same axes because they have incompatible types.
Table variables ''{0}'', ''{1}'', and ''{2}'' cannot be plotted in the same axes because they have incompatible types.
Table variables ''{0}'', ''{1}'', and {2,number,integer} others cannot be plotted in the same axes because they have incompatible types.
X must have length equal to the number of rows in Y.
{0} not shown.
{0} and {1} not shown.
{0}, {1}, and 1 more variable not shown.
{0}, {1}, and {2,number,integer} more variables not shown.
Cell array source data must contain tables or timetables.
Cell array source data must be a vector.
Multiple table or timetable data must be all tables, all timetables, or all eventtables.
Multiple timetable data must have either all duration row times or all datetime row times.
When plotting multiple tables or timetables, 'DisplayVariables' must be a string array, cell array of character vectors, or cell array of text arrays.
Variable ''{0}'' does not exist in table {1}. To use 'XVariable', specify a single variable name common to all input tables or a vector of variable names, one for each input table.
Wrong number of x-variables: {0} provided, but expected {1}. 'XVariable' must specify a single variable name common to all input tables or a vector of variable names, one for each input table.
'XVariable' value must specify a table variable that is the same type for all tables.
'XVariable' value must be a character vector, a string array, or a cell array of character vectors.

All ''{0}'' variables could not be plotted in the same axes because they do not have compatible types across input tables. Set CombineMatchingNames to false to plot incompatible variables on separate axes.

All ''{0}'' and ''{1}'' variables could not be plotted in the same axes because they do not have compatible types across input tables. Set CombineMatchingNames to false to plot incompatible variables on separate axes.

All ''{0}'', ''{1}'', and ''{2}'' variables could not be plotted in the same axes because they do not have compatible types across input tables. Set CombineMatchingNames to false to plot incompatible variables on separate axes.

All ''{0}'', ''{1}'', and {2,number,integer} more variables could not be plotted in the same axes because they do not have compatible types across input tables. Set CombineMatchingNames to false to plot incompatible variables on separate axes.
CombineMatchingNames must be a logical scalar.
''{0}'' is not a variable of any input table or timetable.
Table {0,number,integer} variables {1} cannot be plotted in the same axes because they have incompatible types.
Invalid XVariable removed. {0}
